---
title: Submit Signed Transfer Transaction for Broadcast
slug: /guides/staking-api/cardano/transfer/submit-signed-transfer-transaction
---

After signing the transaction, send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` with the signed payload.
The Staking API will broadcast the transaction to the Cosmos network.

### Parameters

- `name` &mdash; `string` Name of the action to execute (required). `sign_transfer_tx` in this case.
- `inputs` &mdash; `object`
  - `transaction_payload` &mdash; Signed transaction payload from the previous step's response.

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash {5-8}
curl -X PUT 'https://cardano-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/55fcfcdd-b1f5-460c-bce9-8b8864461315/next' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
-d '{
  "name": "sign_transfer_tx",
  "inputs": {
    "transaction_payload": ""
  }
}'
```

### Response

With the signed transaction provided, the Staking API will broadcast it to the network. As the transaction progresses towards confirmation, the returned state will be either:

- `transfer_tx_broadcasting` &mdash; Transaction has been broadcast and is waiting for confirmation.
- `completed` &mdash; Transaction has been confirmed and the transfer is complete.

#### Sample Response

```json {4,8}
{
  "id": "55fcfcdd-b1f5-460c-bce9-8b8864461315",
  "operation": "transfer",
  "state": "transfer_tx_broadcasting",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2023-03-07T20:59:11.072Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "from_account_address": "addr_test1qq37lp9qu5xnh45glqmhwx585kguz3k8jsqe95grjs6zp23j9mvvj53acfrj5mtsn2f5qp258uyrfvzrrrww409nxf3svhyew8",
    "to_account_address": "addr_test1qpr0vyprum2feg2340lmtx0gs3ye0qwnsagwqfhy5pfd5glrhsw5y2xnks9h9x5k6l7wyjdwumqggtnvrn3dyjtt28rsvy9lvz",
    "amount": "10.0",
    "transfer_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "701e79cd816d453ac93018e9550b63c52b394808cfaf011f5b0c180793e4f7f7",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "701e79cd816d453ac93018e9550b63c52b394808cfaf011f5b0c180793e4f7f7",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "addr_test1qq37lp9qu5xnh45glqmhwx585kguz3k8jsqe95grjs6zp23j9mvvj53acfrj5mtsn2f5qp258uyrfvzrrrww409nxf3svhyew8",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": null
    }
  },
  "network_code": "cardano",
  "chain_code": "preprod",
  "created_at": "2023-03-07T20:56:38.877Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-03-07T20:58:10.110Z"
}
```
